Plot
It&#039;s time for Christmas break, and the sorority sisters make plans for 
the holiday, but the strange anonymous phone calls are beginning to 
put them on edge. When Clare disappears, they contact the police, 
who don&#039;t express much concern. Meanwhile Jess is planning to get an 
abortion, but boyfriend Peter is very much against it. The police 
finally begin to get concerned when a 13-year-old girl is found dead 
in the park. They set up a wiretap to the sorority house, but will they 
be in time to prevent a sorority girl attrition problem?
